Welcome to the website for our LIFE4141 population genomics practical. Today we are going to:

1. Perform a PCA on some haplochromine cichlid data
2. [Carry out a sliding window-analysis of FST and DXY on a dataset of Passer sparrows](practical2.html)
3. Calculate haplotype homozygosity statistics between two Passer sparrow species.
